name: Mstoic Shortcodes
author: Hemant Aggarwal

sections.description:
This plugins add support for many shortcodes. It also adds a shortcode generator button to the post editor screen which makes adding shortcodes a breeze. Live preview can be seen before even placing the shortcodes.

See the live preview of all the shortcodes.

List of Available Shortcodes

  • Clear: Clears the floating elements.
  • Buttons: Add buttons in your content. We also have two amazing effects for buttons.
  • Expendable Box: A box that display more content with a click of a button.
  • Facebook Like Box: Add a Facebook like box. Show/Hide Faces. Show/Hide Share Button.
  • Google Maps: Embed Google Maps anywhere you want. Just type the name of the place, and you have a fully functional Google Map.
  • Images: Add images to your content in a beautiful layout. Optionally give Heading and Sub-heading. You also have the option to round the images.
  • Slider Images: Add slider in your post/page content.
  • Space: Clears the floating elements and adds some spacing.
  • Testimonials: Display testimonials in a beautiful new way.
  • Twitter Follow Button: Add a Twitter follow button. Choose from small/large button. Show/Hide Follower count. Show/Hide Twitter username.
  • YouTube Embeds: Embed YouTube videos with a lot of customization options.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin require any other plugin to work

No. This plugin has no dependency.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • A lot of bug fixes.
  • Related posts shortcode looks way better, and is optimized for every device.

1.9.4

  • Now Stable upto WordPress 4.7.2

1.9.3

  • Some more bug fixes

  • Some more bug fixes

  • Some bug fixes

1.9

  • Some bug fixes
  • A new shortcode: Related Posts – Show related posts beautifully.

1.8

  • Some bug fixes
  • Load Font Awesome css file, if not available.

1.7.1

  • Some bug fixes

1.7

  • A new shortcode: Expendable Box – Display/Hide more text with a click of a button.

1.6

  • Animation when AJAX request is in progress.
  • A new shortcode: YouTube Embed – Embed YouTube videos with tons of options to choose from.

1.5.4

  • Bug fixes to the testimonial and slider images shortcode.
  • A new shortcode: Google Maps- Embed Google Maps with just the name of the place.

1.5.1

  • A new shortcode: Testimonials: Display testimonials beautifully.

1.4.8

  • A new shortcode: Slider Images

1.4.5

  • Align option in buttons shortcode

1.4.2

  • Added shortcode Buttons

1.4

  • Bug fixes in Counter shortcode: Center aligning the counters.
  • Added options in counter shortcode: background color, text color.
  • Added Twitter follow button
  • Showing live preview of shortcodes before even adding them

1.3.5

  • Added Facebook Like Button Shortcode
  • Bug Fixes

Counters Working Fine

short_description: Adds support for many shortcodes to your WordPress website.
